# Repository Topics

These are the recommended topics/tags for the Femora repository to improve discoverability:

## Primary Topics
- `women-health`
- `menstrual-cycle`
- `period-tracker`
- `fertility-tracker`
- `reproductive-health`
- `cycle-tracking`

## Technology Topics
- `javascript`
- `html5`
- `css3`
- `vanilla-javascript`
- `localstorage`
- `pwa`
- `web-app`

## Feature Topics
- `calendar`
- `symptom-tracker`
- `contraceptive-tracker`
- `menopause`
- `diet-planner`
- `health-app`
- `ai-insights`

## Regional/Community Topics
- `kenya`
- `africa`
- `healthcare`

## How to Add Topics

### Via GitHub Web Interface:
1. Go to your repository: https://github.com/LABOSO123/Femora
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About" section
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Press Enter after each topic
5. Click "Save changes"

### Via GitHub CLI (if installed):
```bash
gh repo edit LABOSO123/Femora --add-topic "women-health" --add-topic "menstrual-cycle" --add-topic "period-tracker" --add-topic "fertility-tracker" --add-topic "reproductive-health" --add-topic "cycle-tracking" --add-topic "javascript" --add-topic "html5" --add-topic "css3" --add-topic "vanilla-javascript" --add-topic "calendar" --add-topic "symptom-tracker" --add-topic "health-app" --add-topic "kenya"
```

### Recommended Topics List (copy-paste ready):
```
women-health, menstrual-cycle, period-tracker, fertility-tracker, reproductive-health, cycle-tracking, javascript, html5, css3, vanilla-javascript, calendar, symptom-tracker, contraceptive-tracker, menopause, health-app, web-app, pwa, kenya, healthcare
```
